Metadata.defaultDescription: Master Derivatives, Integrals and ODEs with deliberate, interactive practice. Train calculus like an athlete trains their sport.
Metadata.ogDescription: Master Derivatives, Integrals and ODEs with deliberate, interactive practice.

Landing.heroSubtitle: The best way to learn to do math. Replace passive lectures with interactive problem-solving and deliberate practice.
Landing.moduleDerivativesDesc: Differentiation rules, chain rule and related rates.
Landing.moduleODEsDesc: First and second order differential equations.
Landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Each topic has three study modes, designed to take you from theory to fluency.
Landing.modeLearnDesc: Understand the intuition behind each technique with clear explanations, proofs and step-by-step worked examples.
Landing.modeTrainDesc: Solve problems at your own pace. Check the answer and rate your confidence — the system adapts to you.
Landing.modeRecognizeDesc: Given a problem, identify which technique to use. This is the skill that separates knowing the material from passing the exam.
Landing.offer1Title: 22 topics across Calculus I, II and III
Landing.offer1Desc: From the power rule to the Laplace transform — derivatives, integrals and ODEs organized in increasing difficulty.
Landing.offer2Desc: Every exercise has an answer and self-assessment. You know exactly where you stand before moving on.
Landing.offer3Desc: Less passive theory, more problem-solving. The focus is putting pen to paper from minute one.
Landing.blitzModeDesc: 3 minutes on the clock. Maximum problems. 3 strikes and you're out. Test your speed and consistency under pressure — just like the real exam.
Landing.ctaSubtitle: 9 topics unlocked. No credit card required.

About.heroSubtitle: We want you to understand math the way it really is — and get fluent at it.
About.whyTitle: Math isn't magic. It's logical arguments.
About.whyDesc: Most courses teach how to use a formula. We explain why it works. When the path of mathematics is respected, everything makes sense — because at its core, it's just logical arguments applied to axioms.
About.methodDesc: When you understand why a method works, you don't need to memorize — you can reconstruct the tool yourself. In the middle of an exam, when memory fails, understanding doesn't.
About.goalTitle: See the problem, know what to do.
About.goalDesc: Understanding is the foundation — but fluency is the goal. No hesitation, no flipping through notes. You recognize the pattern, pick the right tool, and solve. That's what we train you for.
About.ctaTitle: Ready to truly understand — and get fluent?
